sentence.text: Anastrozole inhibited in vitro metabolic reactions catalyzed by cytochromes P450 1A2, 2C8/9, and 3A4 but only at relatively high concentrations.
Anastrozole did not inhibit P450 2A6 or the polymorphic P450 2D6 in human liver microsomes.
sentence.negationtags: Anastrozole did <scope> <cue> not </cue> inhibit P450 2A6 or the polymorphic P450 2D6 in human liver microsomes. </scope>

sentence.text: Anastrozole did not alter the pharmacokinetics of antipyrine.
sentence.negationtags: Anastrozole did <scope> <cue> not </cue> alter the pharmacokinetics of antipyrine. </scope>

sentence.text: Although there have been no formal interaction studies other than with antipyrine, based on these in vivo and in vitro studies, it is unlikely that co-administration of a 1 mg dose of ARIMIDEX with other drugs will result in clinically significant drug inhibition of cytochrome P450-mediated metabolism of the other drugs.
sentence.negationtags: Although there have been <scope> <cue> no </cue> formal interaction studies other than with antipyrine, based on these in vivo and in vitro studies, it is unlikely that co-administration of a 1 mg dose of ARIMIDEX with other drugs will result in clinically significant drug inhibition of cytochrome P450-mediated metabolism of the other drugs. </scope>

sentence.text: An interaction study with warfarin showed no clinically significant effect of anastrozole on warfarin pharmacokinetics or anticoagulant activity.
sentence.negationtags: An interaction study with warfarin showed <scope> <cue> no </cue> clinically significant effect of anastrozole on warfarin pharmacokinetics or anticoagulant activity. </scope>

sentence.text: At a median follow-up of 33 months, the combination of ARIMIDEX and tamoxifen did not demonstrate any efficacy benefit when compared with tamoxifen in all patients as well as in the hormone receptor-positive subpopulation.
sentence.negationtags: At a median follow-up of 33 months, the combination of ARIMIDEX and tamoxifen did <scope> <cue> not demonstrate </cue> any efficacy benefit when compared with tamoxifen in all patients as well as in the hormone receptor-positive subpopulation. </scope>

sentence.text: This treatment arm was discontinued from the trial.

Based on clinical and pharmacokinetic results from the ATAC trial, tamoxifen should not be administered with anastrozole (see CLINICAL PHARMACOLOGY Drug Interactions and CLINICAL PHARMACOLOGY - Clinical Studies - Adjuvant Treatment of Breast Cancer in Postmenopausal Women subsections).
sentence.negationtags: Based on clinical and pharmacokinetic results from the ATAC trial, tamoxifen should <scope> <cue> not </cue> be administered with anastrozole (see CLINICAL PHARMACOLOGY Drug Interactions and CLINICAL PHARMACOLOGY - Clinical Studies - Adjuvant Treatment of Breast Cancer in Postmenopausal Women subsections). </scope>

sentence.text: Co-administration of anastrozole and tamoxifen resulted in a reduction of anastrozole plasma levels by 27% compared with those achieved with anastrozole alone.
Estrogen-containing therapies should not be used with ARIMIDEX as they may diminish its pharmacologic action.
sentence.negationtags: Estrogen-containing therapies should <scope> <cue> not </cue> be used with ARIMIDEX as they may diminish its pharmacologic action. </scope>

sentence.text: Drug/Laboratory Test Interactions No clinically significant changes in the results of clinical laboratory tests have been observed
sentence.negationtags: Drug/Laboratory Test Interactions <scope> <cue> No </cue> clinically significant changes in the results of clinical laboratory tests have been observed </scope>
